Name: LU 282 - Zoning, 2201-2227 Neptune Avenue Rezoning, Brooklyn (N 240295 ZRK).
Title: Application number N 240295 ZRK (2201-2227 Neptune Avenue Rezoning) submitted by Neptune Avenue Commercial, LLC, pursuant to Section 201 of the New York City Charter for an amendment to the Zoning Resolution of the City of New York, amending Article XII, Chapter 3 (Special Mixed Use District) and modifying APPENDIX F for the purpose of establishing a Mandatory Inclusionary Housing area, Borough of Brooklyn, Community District 13, Council District 47.

History.Description: This Resolution was Approved by Committee
